Prijeli Ljubljančana, ki je izsiljeval v Postojni, v stanovanju je hranil skoraj kilogram heroina
06 Nov 2019, 09:51 by Spletno uredništvo

Konec oktobra so v Pivki prijeli 27-letnega Ljubljančana, ki je v začetku oktobra z nožem in pištolo grozil ter izsiljeval dva moška z območja Postojne, so sporočili iz koprske policijske uprave. Tudi ob prijetju je pri sebi imel pištolo. Med hišno preiskavo so našli tudi večjo količino droge, s prodajo katere bi zaslužil približno 40.000 evrov.



Med hišno preiskavo v stanovanju, ki ga je občasno uporabljal Ljubljančan, so našli skoraj kilogram heroina in približno 3,5 kilograma še neznane prašnate snovi, s katero je najverjetneje mešal drogo. Foto: PU Koper

PIVKA > Ker so sklepali, da je osumljeni lahko nevaren in oborožen, so pri njegovem prijetju poleg policistov PP Postojna sodelovali tudi koprski kriminalisti. Domneva policistov je bila pravilna, saj je 27-letnik ob prijetju imal pri sebi pištolo znamke Beretta, za katero ne poseduje nobenih uradnih dovoljenj.
27-letnemu Ljubljančanu, ki so ga utemeljeno osumili izsiljevanja, so postojnski policisti prišli na sled v oktobru. Ljubljančan je mlajšega moškega iz Postojne izsiljeval za manjši namišljen denarni dolg ter pri tem izsiljevanje večkrat podkrepil z raznimi grožnjami, med katerimi je omenjal tudi orožje. O njem so še izvedeli, da je drugega moškega z območja Postojne s pestjo udaril v obraz in mu poškodoval ličnico.
Na podlagi odredbe sodišča so policisti in kriminalisti v Postojni opravili hišno preiskavo stanovanja, ki ga Ljubljančan občasno uporablja, in osebnega avtomobila. Našli in zasegli so nož, s katerim je grozil, ter večjo hišno količino prepovedane droge. V stanovanju je hranil skoraj kilogram heroina in približno 3,5 kilograma še neidentificirane prašnate snovi. Kriminalisti sumijo, da jo je uporabljal za mešanje s heroinom z namenom povečanja količine. Zasegli so tudi večjo količino gotovine in razne pripomočke (elektronske vage, ročno kovinsko stiskalnico s kalupom …), namenjene pakiranju in nadaljnjemu razpečevanju droge.
Vrednost zasežene droge (brez dodane primesi) bi na trgu znašala približno 40.000 evrov.
Ljubljančana, ki je bil v preteklosti že obravnavan zaradi premoženjskih deliktov in nasilja (zaradi napada na uradno osebo, ko ta opravlja naloge varnosti, je bil tudi obsojen), so na podlagi vseh zbranih obvestil in dokazov 29. oktobra prijeli in ga dan zatem s kazensko ovadbo privedli k preiskovalnemu sodniku v Kopru, ki je zanj odredil pripor.

Arrest of a Ljubljana man who raped Postojna, storing almost a kilo of heroin in his apartment
06 Nov 2019, 09:51 by Web Editing

At the end of October, a 27-year-old Ljubljana man was apprehended in Pivka, threatening and extorting two men from the Postojna area in the beginning of October, the Koper Police Directorate said. Even with his arrest, he had a gun. During a house search, they also found a larger amount of drugs, which would earn about 40,000 euros in sales.



During a house search in an apartment occasionally used by a Ljubljana man, they found almost a kilogram of heroin and about 3.5 kilograms of still unknown dust with which he was likely to mix the drug. Photo: PU Koper

PIVKA> Since they concluded that the suspect could be dangerous and armed, Koper, in addition to the police officers of PP Postojna, participated in his arrest. The police officers' assumption was correct, as the 27-year-old had a Beretta pistol when he was arrested, for which he did not hold any official licenses.
The 27-year-old Ljubljana man, who was suspected of being raped, was tracked down by Postojna police officers in October. The Ljubljana man was extorting a younger man from Postojna for less imaginary monetary debt, and repeatedly reinforced the extortion with various threats, including weapons. They also learned about him stabbing another man in the Postojna area in the face and injuring his cheekbone.
Following a court order, police officers and criminals in Postojna conducted a house search of a Ljubljana apartment he occasionally uses and a car. They found and seized a knife he used to threaten and a large quantity of drugs on the house. He kept nearly one kilogram of heroin and approximately 3.5 kilograms of unidentified dust in the apartment. Criminologists suspect he used it to mix with heroin to increase the amount. They also seized a large amount of cash and various accessories (electronic scales, a hand-held metal press with a mold…) intended for packaging and further distribution of the drug.
The value of the seized drug (without added admixture) on the market would be around € 40,000.
On 29 October, a Ljubljana man, who had already been treated for property offenses and violence (convicted of assaulting an official while performing security duties), was arrested on 29 October and, on the following day, they brought the criminal complaint to a Koper investigating magistrate who ordered him into custody.
